algorithm_technique: hash set for efficient lookup, count matching words
problem_summary_simple: Check if at least two words in a message are present in a banned words list.
problem_summary_technical: Uses a hash set to store banned words for O(1) average time lookups, then iterates through the message to count matches.
key_insights: Using a set for banned words provides efficient O(1) average time complexity for checking word existence.
The problem requires counting occurrences, so a simple boolean check is insufficient; a counter is needed.
The threshold of 2 is crucial for determining spam.
